android.os
Class BatteryStats

java.lang.Object
  android.os.BatteryStats

public abstract class BatteryStats
extends Object

A class providing access to battery usage statistics, including information on wakelocks, processes, packages, and services. All times are represented in microseconds except where indicated otherwise.

Nested Class Summary
static class BatteryStats.Timer
          State for keeping track of timing information.
static class BatteryStats.Uid
          The statistics associated with a particular uid.
 
Field Summary
static int STATS_CURRENT
          Include only the current run in the stats.
static int STATS_LAST
          Include only the last run in the stats.
static int STATS_TOTAL
          Include all of the data in the stats, including previously saved data.
static int STATS_UNPLUGGED
          Include only the run since the last time the device was unplugged in the stats.
static int WAKE_TYPE_FULL
          A constant indicating a full wake lock.
static int WAKE_TYPE_PARTIAL
          A constant indicating a partial wake lock.
static int WAKE_TYPE_WINDOW
          A constant indicating a window wake lock.

computeBatteryUptime

Parameters:

dumpLocked

public void dumpLocked(FileDescriptor fd,
                       PrintWriter pw,
                       String[] args)
Dumps a human-readable summary of the battery statistics to the given PrintWriter.

Parameters:
fd - a FileDescriptor, currently unused.
pw - a PrintWriter to receive the dump output.
args - an array of Strings, currently unused.
